thread.title: Titolo and atmos Team Up for a Premium Edition of the PUMA Disc Blaze
thread.title_full: Titolo and atmos Team Up for a Premium Edition of the PUMA Disc Blaze

author: Marcus Cho
title: Titolo and atmos Team Up for a Premium Edition of the PUMA Disc Blaze
text:
Visit the original post to see all 4 images from this gallery. 
Famed sneaker shops Titolo and atmos have teamed with PUMA for a special collaboration on one of its flagship silhouettes in the Disc Blaze.
Featuring a premium pigskin upper with camo print on the toebox, and a red PUMA side line made from super soft suede, the leather details sit on top of a red nylon upper. Special Titolo and atmos branding can also be found on the heel and insoles of the sneakers, while the inside of the shoe offers a premium treatment with orange mesh lining, on top of a desert camo-printed outsole.
The Titolo x atmos x PUMA Disc Blaze “Desert Dusk” is set to release January 28, 2017 at both Titolo and atmos .
